sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"修理，修复"之意。
means: mend ： 通常指较简单的修复过程，一般不需要专门技术或特殊工具。
repair可与mend换用，但一般指需要较高的职业技能和使用较复杂的工具进行修理。
patch ： 通常指用类似材料修补破洞、裂缝或磨损的地方。
fix ： 多用于美语，仅用于指带有安装固定性质的修理。

word_mean: 修理、修补，恢复，修复：由于新的健康细胞的生长或通过手术对合，使损伤或病变组织自然或机械恢复
设备、部件或零件发生磨损、性能下降以至失效后，为使其恢复到原有可用状态所采取的各种修补、调整、校正措施。

sentence.Network_en: If you are not happy about a repair, go back and complain.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你对修理效果不满意，可以再找他们投诉。

sentence.Network_en: The monks of Ettal keep the abbey in good repair.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃塔尔的修道士把修道院维护得很好。

sentence.Network_en: It would be uneconomic to try and repair it.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中修字的解释 ... (1) 假借为“修”。兴建;兴修[ build] (3) 修理;整修[ repair] (5) 治理[ manage].
个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... renovate 革新；修理 repair 修复，修补 replace 接替，替换.
九年级英语单词表 ... give away 赠送；分发 repair 修理；修补 similar 相似的；相仿的.
化妆品英文词汇大全 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... Oily（ 油性皮肤） Repair（ 修护） Revitalite（ 活化）.

list.abs: 航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(R) ... repairer 修理厂商 repairer 修理工 Repairer's Liability Insurance 船舶修理人责任保险.
航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(R) ... repairability 可修理性 repairable 可修理的 repaired bag 修补过的袋子.
repair capability 修理能力repairability 可修性repeat 中继

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French reparer, from Latin reparare, from re- 'back' + parare 'make ready'
Middle English: from Old French repairer, from late Latin repatriare 'return to one's country' (see repatriate)

entry.def: If you repair something that has been damaged or is not working properly, you mend it.

example.ex: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is wind-proof...
example.tran: 戈德史密斯修理了屋顶，以确保房屋能够抗风。

example.ex: The cost of repairing earthquake damage could be more than seven-thousand-million dollars...
example.tran: 弥补地震造成的损失需要超过70亿美元。

entry.def: If you repair a relationship or someone's reputation after it has been damaged, you do something to improve it.

example.ex: The government continued to try to repair the damage caused by the minister's interview...
example.tran: 政府不断努力弥补因该部长接受采访带来的不良影响。

example.ex: The first and most important thing was to repair my relationship with my father.
example.tran: 最首要和最重要的是挽救我和父亲的关系。

entry.def: A repair is something that you do to mend a machine, building, piece of clothing, or other thing that has been damaged or is not working properly.

example.ex: Many women know how to carry out repairs on their cars...
example.tran: 许多妇女懂得怎样修自己的车。

example.ex: Many of the buildings are in need of repair...

entry.def: If someone repairs to a particular place, they go there.

example.ex: We then repaired to the pavilion for lunch.
example.tran: 然后我们就去凉亭吃午饭了。

entry.tran: (建筑等)维修良好/糟糕，状况良好/ 糟糕
entry.def: If something such as a building is in good repair, it is in good condition. If it is in bad repair, it is in bad condition.

example.ex: The monks of Ettal keep the abbey in good repair...
example.tran: 埃塔尔的修道士把修道院维护得很好。

example.ex: The road was in bad repair in parts.
example.tran: 公路的部分路段路况很差。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of putting something in working order again
2. a formal way of referring to the condition of something;
1. restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken;
2. make amends for; pay compensation for;

sentences.sentence: "One can never fully repair the suffering and losses of the Jews in the Third Reich"
"She was compensated for the loss of her arm in the accident"

means.word_mean: 3. move, travel, or proceed toward some place;

sentences.sentence: "He repaired to his cabin in the woods"

means.word_mean: 5. give new life or energy to;

auth_sentence.content: Tools are indeed better suited to repair a machine.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tools are indeed better suited to repair a machine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tools are indeed better suited to repair a machine.

auth_sentence.content: The whole place has been ecologically damaged beyond repair.
auth_sentence.res_content: The whole place has been ecologically damaged beyond repair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The whole place has been ecologically damaged beyond repair.

auth_sentence.content: Our arrival stimulated them in the work of repair.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our arrival stimulated them in the work of repair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our arrival stimulated them in the work of repair.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =bring birth,表示"生产,生出小孩"; 2. =come in sight,表示"看见;出现"; 3. =get ready,表示"准备;安置"; 4. =equal,表示"平等"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一胎多子的, 经产的, 非初产的, [植]多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: multi多+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→多生产的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 初产的, 初次分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: primi=prim第一,最初+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→adj.初产的, 初次分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每次产一个卵的; 每胎生一子的
stems_affixes.word_buile: uni单一+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→生出一个

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表面上的,貌似真实的;显然的,明明白白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+par看见;出现+ent……的→一再能看见→显而易见
trans横穿+par看见;出现+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
in不+separable[adj.可分离的, 可分的]→adj.不能分的
se分离+par置+able……的→adj.可分离的, 可分的
se分离+par置+ate表形容词→adj.分开的, 分离的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un无+prepare准备+ed……的→adj.无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可比较的, 比得上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compare比较+able……的→adj.可比较的, 比得上的
compare比较+ative表形容词→adj.比较的, 相当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇数的,不成对的,不平等
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+parity[n.同等;奇偶]→adj.奇数的,不成对的,不平等
non不,无+par平等+eil→无平等的→无与伦比的
apparent显然的+ly表副词→adv.显然地
separate分开+ly表副词→adv.个别地;分离地
comparative[adj.比较的, 相当的]+ly表副词→adv.比较地, 相当地
par生产,生出小孩+ent……人→n.父母,母亲;[n.]双亲;父母

stems_affixes.value_cn: 透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃
stems_affixes.word_buile: transparent[[adj.透明的]]→n.透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 器械,器具,仪器;机构,组织
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap=ad+par准备;安置+atus表名词→准备好用的东西→设备
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
prepare准备+ation行为,过程→n.准备, 预备
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com一起+pari=par平等+son→一起平等→比较
dis不+parity同等→n.不同,差异
par平等→n.一对, 一双
par平等+ity表名词→n.同等;奇偶
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
pre预先+par准备;安置+e→预先准备好
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com共同+par平等+e→平等的放在一起→比较
dis不+par平等+age动词后缀→不平等对待→轻视

Sentence.sentence: The woman is doing some repairs.
Tom said he would come to repair our solar heater when he has time.
He spends his spare time doing repairs.
He will be back in a minute to repair the computers.
Self-regulatory repair mechanisms of the free market
It prompted employees to overcharge for work and to complete unnecessary repairs on a company wide basis.

sentences.en: The house is in need of repair.

sentences.cn: 这件上衣有许多修补过的地方。

means.word_mean: 修理; 修补; 修缮

sentences.en: She was repairing a glove when I came in.
sentences.cn: 我进去时, 她在补手套。

means.word_mean: 纠正, 补救, 弥补

sentences.en: How can I repair the wrong I have done her?
sentences.cn: 我怎样才能补偿对她做过的错事呢?

jushi.english: The shirt is so old, it won't repair.
jushi.chinese: 这件衬衫太旧了,无法再修补了。

jushi.english: The most important issue is to repair relations in the region.
jushi.chinese: 目前最重要的问题是如何修复这个地区的紧张关系。

jushi.english: The question is how to repair the error.
jushi.chinese: 问题是如何补救这一错误。
